page.title: 14A Fruit Farm
page.content: Mrs. Peat owns a fruit farm on the main road to Lanark; it is called "The Poplars".The farm is a family business; Mrs. Peat is a widow and her daughter helps her. They grow annual flowers, vegetables, and soft and hard fruit.The most popular fruits are raspberries and strawberries which freeze well. In the summer her day can begin at 4.30.a.m.and last until 10.p.m. At this time of year, she has schoolchildren to help her with the picking. About February she begins to plant her seeds for the summer season. In 1961,when she and her husband bought the farm (it was there long before that)the produce was taken to be sold at the market.But now lots more people have cars, she can sell everything she grows to passing and regular customers.
